asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Want to know how to use your Braun WaterFlex shaver with foam or in shower & how to keep your Braun WaterFlex clean? Watch the video for a guide in how to shave:

1. Apply foam, gel or water to your face.  
2. Hold it at a 90 degrees angle to your face and enjoy a smooth glide and skin feeling.  
3. Rise occasionally under running water.  

Braun WaterFlex with Wet&Dry dual-mode shaving for fresh closeness and smooth skin feeling

Find out more on http://www.braun.com/global/male-grooming/waterflex-shavers.html. 
For tricks and tips in how to shave visit:  http://www.braun.com/global/male-grooming/adviser.html
